## {{< fa book-open title="an open book" >}} Learning objectives {#learning-objectives}

By the end of today's workshop, you should be able to:

- Describe the Bren Career Development Program and identify a roadmap for career success at Bren and beyond. 
- Understand the full range of career services and resources available to full-time Bren students. 
- Understand how to access Bren Career Services and reach out to the MEDS Career Team (Miya, Dave, and Amanda) 
- Understand the [MEDS Data Science Portfolio Calendar](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ttUyJWGn2GHFThHCbUHl4ByfK1a_UzJ51QwRZRynUbc/edit?gid=457321000#gid=457321000) and how coursework and career development offerings contribute to building a professional portfolio aligned with career goals. 
- Articulate the Bren School career ethos and the importance of engaging in career development as part of their experience in a community of change-makers.

## {{< fa plus title="plus" >}} What should I continue working on? {#continue-working}

- [**Sign up for BrenConnect**]{.teal-text}. Steps:
    - Access BrenConnect at [https://brenconnect.force.com/s/](https://brenconnect.force.com/s/){target="_blank"} 
    - Create an account using either:
        - SSO (use your UCSB Google account) 
        - Unique username & password (use @ucsb.edu email, NOT @bren.ucsb.edu email) 
    -  Update your BrenConnect profile with:
        - Your work & education history 
        - A professional headshot 
    - Start exploring! 
- [**Accept invitations**]{.teal-text} to your shared career Box folder and Google Calendar career events 
    - You’ll get invitations via email from our Career Coordinator, Daisy Martinez 
- [**Download Microsoft Word**]{.teal-text} (desktop version). Follw [these instructions](https://www.connect.ucsb.edu/messaging-collaboration-services/microsoft-office-365){target="_blank"} to download and start using Microsoft Office 365 with your UCSB credentials
- [**Upload your initial resume**]{.teal-text} to your shared career Box folder before **Monday, September 22nd**
